articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets Russian FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets Russian FM
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Monday sent a message of greeting to Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 The treaty has made an important contribution to more energetically developing the friendly and cooperative relations with a long history and tradition between the peoples of the two countries in the new century, the message said, adding:
					
					 This year, the two countries will greet the 15th anniversary of the treaty, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the 70th anniversary of the victory in the patriotic war of Russia, important events in protecting the freedom and independence of the countries and the peace and security of the world, and celebrate the year of the DPRK-Russia friendship, the first of its kind in the bilateral relations. 
					
					  In the belief that this year greeting the significant holidays, the DPRK-Russia relations will grow stronger comprehensively and epochally in the spirit of common understanding reached between the top leaders and the inter-state treaty, the message wished him greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Performance Given by KPA Song and Dance Ensemble
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble Monday gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture to celebrate the 67th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 It was enjoyed by officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel. 
					
					 The performance began with chorus "We Wish Supreme Commander Good Health ". Put on the stage were orchestra and chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army", chorus "Cantata to Marshal Kim Il Sung", male chorus "Let's Defend the Party Central Committee at the Cost of Our Lives" and other pieces. 
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by successfully accomplishing the cause of building regular revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 They made an artistic representation of the brilliant history of the heroic Korean People's Army which has steadfastly carried forward the tradition of invincibility and its own revolutionary nature generation after generation. 
					
					 Serial songs "Distinguished Military Service Medal of Soldier", "May Tell Love of Soldier", "Soldiers Call Me Bush Warbler" and "Train and Train" which reflect the revolutionary spirit and optimism of service personnel stirred up the festive atmosphere. 
					
					 The performance reflected the firm pledge of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. It ended with chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only".

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- There opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday with due ceremony a national photo exhibition "Holding High Banner of Songun" to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition are photos showing the undying revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who performed great feats in the history of building the revolutionary armed forces, accompanying President Kim Il Sung providing Songun leadership.
					
					 Such photos as "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il giving important instructions to develop the Korean People's Army" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il visiting Tabaksol post" impressively show his noble personality as brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Photos such as "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the land realignment in South Hwanghae Province" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il examining vinalon cotton" deal with the tireless efforts and devotion made by him while traveling a lot to mix with the people all his life.
					
					 Photos "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il and respected Comrade Kim Jong Un making long journeys for Songun leadership", "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il and respected Comrade Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army" and other photos deal with the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by providing an eternal foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 Also on display are such photos as ones showing the personality of Kim Jong Un as a peerless great man successfully carrying forward Kim Jong Il's revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 There are also photos documenting the stirring reality of the country and the firm faith and will of service personnel to win a final victory in the showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Conferred upon Persons of Merit
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Conferred upon Persons of Merit 
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was conferred upon Kim Tuk Sam and Pak Kyong Gyu on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They greatly contributed to improving the people's living standard and building an economic power by laying a firm material and technological foundation of their factories and over-fulfilling the national economy plan every year.
					
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a relevant decree on Jan. 21.

articles.title: Building-Materials Exhibition Built
articles.content:
Building-Materials Exhibition Built
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A building-materials exhibition was newly built at the Heavy Industry Hall of the Three-Revolution Exhibition House in Pyongyang.
					 The exhibits, presented by the Chollima Tile Factory, the Pyongyang Building-materials Factory and other factories, are made with locally available raw materials and technologies.
					
					 They include tiles and products of metal, stone, plastic and wood as well as LED lamps, waterproof liquids, detergents and epoxy resin paints.
					
					 The building materials were used in the construction of apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology, Masikryong Ski Resort, the May Day Stadium, Unha Scientists Street and other edifices.
					
					 Kim Hyon Chol, curator of the Heavy Industry Hall, told KCNA that the exhibition gives a glimpse of the nation's architectural development.
					
					 Consumers can make a contract on the spot.

articles.title: Pyongyang Cold Noodle, Traditional Korean Food
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cold Noodle, Traditional Korean Food
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Restaurants including Okryu Restaurant and Pyongyang Noodle House, well-known for serving famous Pyongyang cold noodle, one of traditional Korean food, are crowded with guests even in this winter season.
					 It is said that Pyongyang cold noodle was originated in the period of Koryo Dynasty (918-1392).
					
					 In this regard, Kim Ji Won, a section chief of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 There is a story that a king of the dynasty praised Pyongyang cold noodle as the best dish in the world.
					
					 Buckwheat, raw materials of the noodle, helps lower high blood pressure and prevent senile arteriosclerosis and other diseases.

articles.title: Cooking Contests Scheduled in DPRK for This Year
articles.content:
Cooking Contests Scheduled in DPRK for This Year
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Cooking contests will take place in the DPRK this year to develop the country's food culture.
					 According to Kim Yong Il, section chief of the C.C., Korean Association of Cooks, this year will see various cooking contests aimed to develop cookeries and improve the people's diet.
					
					 They include a national cooking competition and an April holiday food festival to be held on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, leader Kim Jong Il's birthday (February 16), and the Day of the Sun, President Kim Il Sung's birthday (April 15).
					
					 Contests of making ssukttok (rice cake seasoned with wormwood) and makkoli (crude liquor) and an edible herb dish show are expected in May and June and a seasonal kimchi-making contest and other cooking contests in July and August.
					
					 A national Korean food show is slated in October to mark the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, followed by a contest of cooking local specialty dishes, fish cooking competition and a contest of cooking adzuki-bean gruel.

articles.title: Kunjari Spirit Created in 1950s
articles.content:
Kunjari Spirit Created in 1950s
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Kunjari spirit now inspires the army and people in the DPRK to the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					 This spirit was created during the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War by workers in Kunja-ri of the country, who had produced weaponry and ammunition for the war victory. It is characterized with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, the self-sacrificing spirit and the revolutionary optimism.
					
					 In hearty response to President Kim Il Sung's call "Everything for victory in the war!", those workers at a munitions factory located in tunnels of Kunja-ri had produced weaponry and ammunition days and nights even by operating machines manually.
					
					 Most of them were women, and they conducted a multi-machine tending campaign, with one operating even six machines.
					
					 The factory organized a death-defying corps with 20 workers, who finished assembling 750 sets of submachine guns in six days.
					
					 During the war, Kim Il Sung visited the factory on several occasions to encourage its workers to increased production. He saw to it that a bath-house and a clinic were opened to service in the tunnels.
					
					 The factory produced the first awardee of the title of DPRK Labor Hero in the field of munitions industry and established a study-while-working educational system for the first time in the country.
					
					 The Kunjari spirit has served as an inspiring banner for the Korean workers.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Flays U.S. Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Flays U.S. Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Another shocking U.S. human rights abuse has been disclosed.
					 It has kept private houses under secret radar watch since several years ago.
					
					 More than 50 security organs including FBI have strictly watched movements of peoples inside houses by radar monitoring system called Range-R without any approval.
					
					 This human rights abuse deserves international criticism as it is a violation of Article 12 of the World Declaration on Human Rights which does not allow the high-handed interference or breach of privacy, family, houses and correspondence.
					
					 The U.S. has perpetrated all sorts of base and dirty crimes including wiretapping of not only its people but also various parts of the world so far.
					
					 But the radar monitoring of the private houses disclosed this time puts into the shade the criminal nature of wiretapping in its baseness and meanness.
					
					 This hideous human rights abuse can be perpetrated only by the U.S. which stoops to any infamy under the hypocritical slogans of "human civilization" and "respect for human rights".
					
					 The U.S., a country of burglars, seems not to consider it as a serious crime to breach the privacy of an individual as it makes no scruple of committing horrible genocide in various parts of the world. Even at this moment the U.S. is committing ceaseless human rights abuses such as wiretapping, radar monitoring of houses, killings of people despite strong protest and denunciation from the international community.
					
					 Such acts are being perpetrated by the U.S. in an organized and premeditated manner, pursuant to its unpopular and unethical domestic and foreign policies enforced under the motto of "protection of human rights".
					
					 The U.S., indeed, is the cesspool of the human rights abuses and worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The U.S. should be brought to an international tribunal by humankind for its ever-increasing human rights abuses.
					
					 It should be eliminated from the world for its worst corruption and threat to the human civilization, existence and security. 
					
					 It had better face a stern punishment meted out by world justice and conscience.

articles.title: DPRK Will Not Sit with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Not Sit with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama was reported to have blustered that north Korea was the "most isolated, most sanctioned and most cut-off dictatorial state on earth and over time you will see it collapse." He also cried out for bringing down it as early as possible through cyber warfare. 
					 Then U.S. politicians and brass hats of the military vied with each other in echoing Obama's utterances. 
					
					 It is self-evident that the DPRK can never sit at a negotiating table with the U.S. imperialists to discuss bilateral issues under this situation, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Very just was the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK that it neither feels any need to sit with the U.S. making desperate efforts for stamping out the ideology of the DPRK and bringing down its social system nor has any willingness to deal with it. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are quite different from those of some countries which voted for the U.S. under its pressure without their own confidence and will and were taken in by its deceptive dialogue. 
					
					 If the U.S. wants confrontation with the DPRK so eagerly, the latter is fully prepared to react to it. 
					
					 It can react to any forms of war, operation and combat wanted and chosen by the U.S. and cope with any war including war by conventional armed forces and nuclear war. It is the stand of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK. 
					
					 The wolf-like U.S. imperialists working with blood-shot eyes to hurt the DPRK will surely have to pay a very high price for it.

articles.title: Dangerous Evacuation Racket Protested
articles.content:
Dangerous Evacuation Racket Protested 
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Residents in Kuryong Village in Kaepho-dong, Kangnam District, Seoul strongly protested against the district office authorities' action to seize their self-governing hall, according to MBC of south Korea on Feb. 6.
					 The district office authorities threatened to forcibly evacuate the hall by labeling its use as illegal under an unreasonable pretext.
					
					 Defying the residents' protest, the authorities kicked up a reckless racket for evacuating the hall on Feb. 6 with at least 400 staff members of the district office and more than 100 gangsters of the evacuation group involved.
					
					 Those involved in the evacuation resorted to violence against the protesters. Hundreds of policemen encircled the scene of evacuation, threatening the residents.
					
					 The reckless violence left residents wounded. This was reminiscent of the Ryongsan disaster six year ago.

articles.title: Christian Organizations Urge Park Geun Hye to Make Apology
articles.content:
Christian Organizations Urge Park Geun Hye to Make Apology 
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Christian Joint Measure Committee for Checking Intrusion into Church and Suppression of Peace Movement in south Korea held a press conference outside the Christian Hall in Seoul on February 2 in protest against the puppet police's crackdown. 
					 Speakers there referred to the fact that some days ago the chief of Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency made an apology, claiming that the police did not know that Peace Church was a church and it was something regretful, when their search for the church touched off a strong protest. 
					
					 The speakers declared it was obviously suppression of religion and retaliation against the peace movement including the action against the "lighting ceremony" on Aegibong Light Tower. 
					
					 A press release was read out there. 
					
					 It termed the expression of regret by the chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency hypocrisy. 
					
					 What happened was not a simple mistake but an inevitable product of the authorities' campaign for eliminating "followers of the north" for which the chief executive is to blame, it said. 
					
					 It urged Park Geun Hye to make an open apology and stop all suppression. 
					
					 Stressing the need for the authorities to reprove those who allowed and gave order for the search and for the minister of Justice to make an open apology and promise for preventing recurrence, the press release said the measure committee would stubbornly carry on the sit-in until all demands are met.

articles.title: FMD, Bird Flu Continue Spreading in S. Korea
articles.content:
FMD, Bird Flu Continue Spreading in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease and bird flu continue spreading in south Korea.
					 Cattle infected with foot-and-mouth disease were found in a farmhouse in Jechon, North Chungchong Province on February 6 and pigs were infected with foot-and-mouth disease in Cheonan, South Chungchong Province.
					
					 The disease broke out in Hongsong, South Chungchong Province on February 7.
					
					 Hongsong was hit hard by the disease in 2011 and at that time more than 50,000 pigs were buried.
					
					 A migratory bird was found infected with bird flu in Songdong District, Seoul on Feb. 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Brazilian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il and Mt. Paektu" and a photo of Kim Jong Il's birthplace at the Paektusan Secret Camp on its website on January 26 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The article said:
					
					 Mt. Paektu of the DPRK is the native place of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He boundlessly loved Mt. Paektu and yearned for it in his lifetime.
					
					 The Paektusan Secret Camp was a cradle of life that helped him get possessed of personality as an illustrious commander.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, son of Mt. Paektu, lived a passionate life, always keeping Mt. Paektu in his mind.
					
					 He mounted Mt. Paektu whenever he was faced with difficulties and hardships in the way for defending the country and people and hardened his invincible faith and will and carried on the road of difficult long journey of Songun.
					
					 Even powerful enemies bent their knees before the great man who was just like Mt. Paektu in disposition, pluck, spirit, soul, character and personality and the DPRK could demonstrate its might as a powerful nation looked up by the world.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of all the people together with Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution which would stand and shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly posted a special write-up on website on February 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, illustrated with his photo.
					 The website in an article titled "Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is an iron-willed commander who won victories squarely standing against the imperialist powers" said:
					
					 After Kim Jong Il passed away, the title of the DPRK Generalissimo was awarded to him, a deserved appreciation of the ever-victorious iron-willed commander.
					
					 He was born as son of President Kim Il Sung, guerrilla commander, and Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Il grew up hearing gunfire of the great anti-Japanese war and experiencing severe war against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Through such an unusual growth he kept a revolutionary faith that one always has to be decisive and merciless when dealing with the imperialist aggressors.
					
					  The website cited facts that he fully showed his personality and qualifications as brilliant commander in the ceaseless confrontation with the U.S. imperialists including the U.S. spy ship Pueblo case, large-sized spy plane EC-121 incident and nuclear crisis on the Korean peninsula in the 1990s.
					
					 It introduced the exploits of the peerless great man who turned the DPRK into a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state and stressed that his august name would shine forever as a symbol of victory of the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Denmark
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Copenhagen, Denmark on February 3.
					 A member of the leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events to praise the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on February 2 and 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included round-table talks and film shows by the SHI Group of Iran, a furniture factory in Abuja, Nigeria and an Angolan company.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "Arms of Korea" and "Okryu Children's Hospital".
					
					 The manager in charge of foreign trade and commerce of the SHI Group of Iran said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was a distinguished leader of not only the Korean people but world progressives.
					
					 The exploits performed by him will be immortal.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Korean people greater success in the building of a thriving socialist nation under the wise guidance of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The manager of the Nigerian factory noted with high appreciation that the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il is being carried forward by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers including the general director of the Angolan company noted:
					
					 There are many notable politicians of the West as well as heads of state among the world politicians whom HE Kim Jong Il met. This historical fact helps us realize once again that he was a peerless elder statesman possessed of prominent political abilities. The immortal exploits performed by him for the cause of global independence will further shine thanks to HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries on February 2 and 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 They included a lecture in Guinea, round-table talks in Ethiopia and film shows in Nigeria.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The dean of the art faculty of a Guinean university said that Kim Jong Il's life was one of noble patriotism as he devoted his all to the bright future of the country and people.
					
					 He stressed that the venerable image of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the building of a rich and powerful nation and happiness of the people would always be kept in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive mankind.
					
					 Directors of Ethiopian hospitals highly praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher with his unique Songun politics and affirmed that the Korean people would always win only victory as there is Marshal Kim Jong Un who has the same personality and qualifications as Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: IRP publica acta de acusacion a EE.UU. que impide la mejora de relaciones N-S
articles.content:
IRP publica acta de acusacion a EE.UU. que impide la mejora de relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia 8 un acta de acusacion para delatar los crimenes de Estados Unidos que viene impidiendo la mejora de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y la reunificacion de Corea.
					Sobre todo, el documento califica a EE.UU. de enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana que ocupo ilegalmente durante 70 anos el territorio surcoreano y obstaculizo la mejora de relaciones N-S y la reunificacion.
					
					EE.UU. dividio en dos partes a Corea al fabricar el poder titere de Syngman Rhee dando espaldas a la historica Conferencia Conjunta del Norte y el Sur de Abril, convocada despues de la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto de 1945) con el fin de establecer un gobierno reunificado y democratico, recuerda el acta y prosigue:
					
					Cuando estuvo a punto de expulsarse del suelo surcoreano debido a la gran derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, el imperio violo flagrantemente el Acuerdo de Armisticio, que acordo la retirada de todos los efectivos extranjeros y la solucion pacifica del problema coreano, bajo el pretexto de que "no puede retirarse jamas porque sufrio en Corea cientos de miles de bajas".
					
					La campana obstaculizadora de EE.UU. se torno mas abierta en la decada de 2000 en que quedaron aprobadas y publicadas la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre gracias a las historicas cumbres intercoreanas de Pyongyang y ambas partes coreanas se dirigian a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					La misma campana se hizo mas brutal todavia despues de la aparicion del actual "poder".
					
					En particular, a principio del ano pasado cuando gracias a los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC, tuvo lugar el contacto de alto nivel entre el Norte y el Sur y hubo el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, EE.UU. hizo todo lo posible por romper la dificilmente preparada atmosfera de dialogo y mejora de relaciones.
					
					Como resultado, resultaron infructiferos nuestros sinceros esfuerzos del ano pasado por la mejora de relaciones N-S y la reunificacion de Corea y las relaciones intercoreanas se vieron empeoradas mas.
					
					Los continuos y demenciales ejercicios de guerra librados por EE.UU. agravaron al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de Corea, EE.UU. desato por fin la guerra coreana al cabo de cometer los ejercicios de guerra y las provocaciones militares contra el Norte de Corea en los alrededores del paralelo 38.
					
					Despues del cese de fuego, libro desde 1954 el ejercicio militar conjunto "Focus Lens" entre las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y el ejercito titere surcoreano, para que resultara frustrada la reunion politica para discutir el proyecto de solucion pacifica del problema coreano.
					
					En la decada de 1960, comenzaron los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Foal Eagle".
					
					Desde 1976, llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase conflictiva con las maniobras "Team Sprit" y "Ulji Focus Lens".
					
					Se ampliaron gradualmente la dimension y el periodo de los ejercicios militares.
					
					Por otra parte, provoco sin cesar las provocaciones militares, inclusive el incidente de conflicto armado de 2002 en el Mar Oeste.
					
					Sobre todo, los ejercicios militares para la agresion a la RPDC desarrollados en el ano pasado demuestran claramente cuan desesperados son los esfuerzos de EE.UU. por impedir la mejora de relaciones N-S.
					
					Esos esfuerzos llegan al extremo en este ano.
					
					Por ejemplo, la administracion Obama dicto la "sancion adicional" contra la RPDC desde el principio de este ano bajo el pretexto de hacking sobre "SONY Pictures".
					
					EE.UU. dice que "aplaude el dialogo N-S", pero, ejerce presion a las autoridades surcoreanas para que ellas no dialoguen con la RPDC.
					
					Arrodilladas ante la presion de EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas, que hablaban tanto del dialogo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea hasta principios del ano nuevo, lo evaden ahora con pretextos absurdos como "injustas condiciones del Norte" y "su insistencia de desgaste".
					
					Asi quieren ocultar su miserable situacion de lacayo colonial e intentan imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la no apertura del dialogo.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, se arman los complots para inculcar la hostilidad anti-RPDC.
					
					Para colmo, EE.UU. agrava intencionalmente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana reforzando sus fuerzas armadas e intensifican mas que nunca los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC desde el principio de este ano.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente las severas advertencias del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu, de que EE.UU. sufrira la destruccion final si continua su anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y sus imprudentes maniobras agresivas.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben dejar en claro su decision: abrir el camino de mejoramiento de relaciones N-S y reunificacion en la posicion de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" o continuar con EE.UU. los ejercicios belicos y las maniobras de confrontacion entre regimenes que se les buscaran las desgracias.
					
					Si EE.UU. sigue impidiendo la mejora de relaciones N-S y la reunificacion manteniendo la politica hostil anti-RPDC desoyendo la advertencia de esta, seran balanceados todos sus crimenes cometidos historicamente y los pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico del EPC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de musica y danza de Conjunto Artistico del EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion de musica y danza del Conjunto Artistico del Ejercito Popular de Corea en celebracion del 67o aniversario del desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung. 
					La presenciaron los funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y los oficiales y los soldados del EPC. 
					
					En la escena se pusieron el coro "Deseamos buena salud al Comandante Supremo", la musica orquestal y coro "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el coro "Himno al Mariscal Kim Il Sung", el coro masculino "Defendamos a riesgo de la vida el Comite Central del Partido" y otras piezas. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las proezas del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien cumplio con brillantez la causa de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares.
					
					Y describieron con escenas artisticas la historia del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea  que vino heredando con pureza la tradicion siempre victoriosa y su naturaleza revolucionaria.
					
					Cantaron la ferviente decision de los militares y civiles de Corea de lograr la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					La funcion termino con el coro "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal".

articles.title: Depositadas ofrendas florales en Cementerio de Martires de Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
articles.content:
Depositadas ofrendas florales en Cementerio de Martires de Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 67o aniversario del desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, los funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y trabajadores depositaron ayer las ofrendas florales en el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Estaban colocados una ofrenda a nombre del MINFAP y los ramos florales en la plataforma de ofrendas florales "Espiritu de Heroes".
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires y pasaron revista a las tumbas.

articles.title: Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por 8 de febrero
articles.content:
Depositados cestos de flores ante estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por 8 de febrero
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 8 de febrero, dia de la fundacion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares de Corea, todos los militares y civiles de Corea rinden el mas sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					Los oficiales y los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores lo hicieron ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos levantadas en el recinto del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					Ante las estatuas fueron depositados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores en nombre de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el MINFAP, el Estado Mayor General y las unidades a todos los niveles del EPC.
					
					Fueron colocados tambien los cestos, ramos y ramitas de floreas ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos y sus retratos con amplia sonrisa, erguidas en el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung y otras academias militares y las grandes unidades combinadas, asi como en la ciudad de esta capital y localidades.

articles.title: Iniciada exposicion nacional de fotos por el Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Iniciada exposicion nacional de fotos por el Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada la exposicion nacional de fotos con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il intitulada "Levantando en alto la bandera del Songun". 
					Acompanando al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung en la direccion de Songun, el Dirigente acumulo grandes proezas en la historia de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Estan exhibidas en la sede de galeria las fotos alusivas a esa cronica de actividades revolucionarias del General Insigne del Paektu, tales como "El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dando instrucciones programaticas para el fortalecimiento del Ejercito Popular", "El Dirigente Kim Jong Il visitando el Puesto de Pinos". 
					
					"El Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigiendo en el terreno el ordenamiento de las tierras cultivables de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur", "El Dirigente Kim Jong Il examinando el algodon de vinalon" y otras fotos describen los esfuerzos abnegados de este gran hombre por la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					"El Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un continuando el largo camino del Songun", "El Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un inspeccionando una unidad aerea y antiaerea del Ejercito Popular de Corea" narran las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente quien preparo la base de eterna duracion para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					Se ven ademas otras fotos alusivas a las nobles personalidades del Mariscal quien continua firmemente la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Dirigente. 
					
					Otras fotos demuestran la realidad de la patria y la ferrea voluntad y conviccion de los oficiales y soldados del EPC de lograr la victoria final en la confrontacion antiyanqui.
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.
